item.title: Software Engineer (cupertino)
item.description:
We are looking for a dynamic software engineer with the right combination of skills and 5+ years of experience architecting and implementing scalable web services. In addition you need to instrument their analytics, define and implement APIs and API wrappers. You will also be responsible for helping the adaptation of good design and coding standards. You have to be a self-starter, a strong team contributor, and a fast learner.

The ideal candidate will have a very strong background in the following:
 Experience with web software architectures and protocols REST, SOAP, RPC
 Experience in building large-scale server applications and systems
 Experience with providing web services, web APIs
 Experience with C, C++, C# and web programming languages such as Java, JavaScript, HTML, AJAX, CSS, Flash, PHP, Perl
 Experience with web server administration, LAMP, WAMP
 Experience with web programming frameworks such as Zend, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion
 Experience in both Windows and Linux/UNIX
 Familiarity with Amazon EC3
 Experience with administration and maintenance of SQL databases

You will need BSc or MS in Computer Science or a related field.

About Ricoh Innovations (www.rii.ricoh.com):

Ricoh Innovations was founded in 1997 as a California subsidiary of Ricoh Company, Ltd. (Tokyo), with the challenge of creating new technology and business opportunities for the worldwide Ricoh Group. Throughout our history, we have maintained a strong research program that provides both seminal ideas and the technical foundation for these and other innovations. We also maintain close collegial relations with Ricohs technology and marketing staff in the US, Asia and Europe.

Ricoh Innovations is an equal opportunity employer and encourages all qualified women and minorities to apply. Applicants must already be qualified to work in the USA. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package.
